query:
ALTER TABLE shipping_destinations 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS code VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS name VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS state VARCHAR(2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS city VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS region VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightType VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightFixedValue DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightFormula TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightFormulaDescription TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxType VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxFixedValue DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxFormula TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxFormulaDescription TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS icmsPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS icmsStPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS pisPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS cofinsPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ipiPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'ativo',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS createdBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedBy INT;
command:
mysql --batch --raw --column-names --default-character-set=utf8mb4 --host gateway03.us-east-1.prod.aws.tidbcloud.com --port 4000 --user 3uYwUxtivMj8soi.e2c3e95bc24b --database aAFi3UvfwvVXettMY36Wvq --execute ALTER TABLE shipping_destinations 
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS code VARCHAR(20),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS name VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS state VARCHAR(2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS city VARCHAR(255),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS region VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightType VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightFixedValue DECIMAL(10,2),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightFormula TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS freightFormulaDescription TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxType VARCHAR(50),
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxFixedValue DECIMAL(10,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxFormula TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS taxFormulaDescription TEXT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS icmsPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS icmsStPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS pisPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS cofinsPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS ipiPercent DECIMAL(5,2) DEFAULT 0,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS status VARCHAR(20) DEFAULT 'ativo',
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS createdBy INT,
ADD COLUMN IF NOT EXISTS updatedBy INT;
